description.value:
When worn, any Psyker trying to use a Psychic Power within 50m of character must first pass a +0 Willpower Test or reduce their Psy Rating by 1 per Degree of Failiure lasting Degree of Failiure Turns. Test is taken each time a power tries to be used. No effect on Psykers Dedicated to Tzeentch.

Requirements

Only functions for those dedicated to Tzeentch. Heretical.

Effect: Very Rare

Notes: -

system.effect: When worn, any Psyker trying to use a Psychic Power within 50m of character must first pass a +0 Willpower Test or reduce their Psy Rating by 1 per Degree of Failiure lasting Degree of Failiure Turns. Test is taken each time a power tries to be used. No effect on Psykers Dedicated to Tzeentch.
